entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:13 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Argentia 03:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: NNE 23 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain at times heavy mixed with freezing rain and ice pellets beginning early this evening then changing to freezing rain before morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Freezing rain or snow. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to snow near noon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 10 except minus 14 inland.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then clearing. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the evening then light after midnight. Low minus 10 except minus 14 inland. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023
